## 8.3.0 — 2020-08-18

## 8.2.0 — 2020-05-27

### 🛠 Breaking changes

- The base64 output will no longer contain newline and special character (`\n`, `\r`) on Android. ([#7841](https://github.com/expo/expo/pull/7841) by [@jarvisluong](https://github.com/jarvisluong))
